title: Implement OAuth2 authentication with JWT tokens

subgoals.title: Implement OAuth provider integration
subgoals.description: Add Google and GitHub OAuth providers with proper callback handling. Configure OAuth client credentials, implement authorization flow, and handle callback responses. Store user profile data from OAuth providers.

subgoals.title: Implement JWT token generation and validation
subgoals.description: Create JWT utility functions for token lifecycle management. Generate access tokens with 15-minute expiry and refresh tokens with 7-day expiry. Implement token signature validation and claims verification.

subgoals.title: Add token refresh endpoint
subgoals.description: Implement API endpoint for refreshing expired access tokens. Accept refresh token, validate it, and issue new access token. Handle token rotation and revocation.

subgoals.title: Write OAuth integration tests
subgoals.description: Test OAuth authorization flow end-to-end for both Google and GitHub providers. Test token generation, validation, and refresh mechanisms. Test error handling for invalid tokens and expired sessions.

subgoals.title: Update authentication documentation
subgoals.description: Document OAuth setup, configuration, and usage. Include provider registration steps, environment variable configuration, and code examples for common authentication scenarios.
